languages.text:
Whenever the wielder uses this grenade, they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 rounds. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} levels of burning.
languages.original_text:
Применяющий эту гранату получает 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g}.
Граната создает область {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} на 3 раунда. Когда любое существо входит в эту область (или находится там в момент ее появления), оно получает 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 30%, а также {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} уровня горения.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wielder uses this grenade, they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 rounds. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} levels of burning.

Whenever the wielder uses this grenade, they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 rounds. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} levels of burning.

Whenever the wielder uses this grenade, they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 rounds, deals 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} on impact, and inflicts burning {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e}.

Whenever the wielder uses this grenade, they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 rounds. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} levels of burning.

languages.text:
使用此手雷时，使用者会承受5点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。
手雷会形成一片{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}区域，持续三轮。所有进入燃烧区域的生物（或是手雷爆炸时处于区域内的生物）都会受到10点{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}。此次攻击拥有30%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}，同时施加燃烧（{uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e}）状态。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wielder uses this grenade, they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 rounds. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} levels of burning.

traits.locale_text:
使用此手雷时，使用者会承受5点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。
手雷会形成一片{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}区域，持续三轮。所有进入燃烧区域的生物（或是手雷爆炸时处于区域内的生物）都会受到10点{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}。此次攻击拥有30%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}，同时施加燃烧（{uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e}）状态。

使用此手雷时，使用者会承受5点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。
手雷会形成一片{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}区域，持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。手雷爆炸时造成10点{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}。此次攻击拥有30%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}，同时施加燃烧（{uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e}）状态。

languages.text:
Cuando el usuario lanza esta granada, sufre 5 de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g}.
Esta granada crea una zona {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardiente{/g} que dura 3 asaltos. Cualquier criatura que entre en la zona (o que esté en ella al aplicarse el efecto) sufre 10 puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} con {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del 30 % y {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} niveles de quemadura.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wielder uses this grenade, they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 rounds. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} levels of burning.

traits.locale_text:
Cuando el usuario lanza esta granada, sufre 5 de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g}.
Esta granada crea una zona {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardiente{/g} que dura 3 asaltos. Cualquier criatura que entre en la zona (o que esté en ella al aplicarse el efecto) sufre 10 puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} con {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del 30 % y {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} niveles de quemadura.

Cuando el usuario lanza esta granada, sufre 5 de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g}.
Esta granada crea una {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}zona ardiente{/g} que dura 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}, inflige 10 de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} con 30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} e inflige quemadura {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e}.

languages.text:
このグレネードを使用した際、保有者は5の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
このグレネードは3ラウンド継続する{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}エリア作る。このエリアに侵入する（もしくは効果が適用される瞬間にそこに立っている）あらゆる生物は、30％の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ10{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}と{uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e}レベルの炎上を受ける。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wielder uses this grenade, they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 rounds. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} levels of burning.

traits.locale_text:
このグレネードを使用した際、保有者は5の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
このグレネードは3ラウンド継続する{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}エリア作る。このエリアに侵入する（もしくは効果が適用される瞬間にそこに立っている）あらゆる生物は、30％の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ10{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}と{uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e}レベルの炎上を受ける。

使用者がこのグレネードを使用するたびに、5の{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}を与える。
3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}消えない{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}エリアを作り、着弾時に30%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ10の{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}災ダメージ{/g}を与え、炎上({uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e})を付与する。

languages.text:
Применяющий эту гранату получает 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g}.
Граната создает область {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} на 3 раунда. Когда любое существо входит в эту область (или находится там в момент ее появления), оно получает 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 30%, а также {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} уровня горения.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wielder uses this grenade, they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 rounds. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} levels of burning.

traits.locale_text:
Применяющий эту гранату получает 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g}.
Граната создает область {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} на 3 раунда. Когда любое существо входит в эту область (или находится там в момент ее появления), оно получает 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 30%, а также {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} уровня горения.

Граната создает область {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Каждый, кто входит в эту область или начинает свой ход внутри нее, получает эффект горения (10) на 3 раунда. {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Пробитие брони{/g} у этой атаки составляет 6%. Также она вдвое уменьшает количество {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очков передвижения{/g} у всех целей, кроме тех, что обладают убеждением Империум ранга "фанатик" или выше.

Применяющий эту гранату получает 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g}.
Граната создает область {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} на 3 раунда, которая при попадании наносит 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 30% и накладывает горение {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e}.

Применяющий эту гранату получает 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g}.
Граната создает область {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} на 3 раунда. Когда любое существо входит в эту область (или находится там в момент ее появления), оно получает 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 30%, а также {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} уровня горения.

languages.text:
Wenn der Träger diese Granate einsetzt, erleidet er 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g}.
Diese Granate erzeugt einen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brennenden{/g} Bereich, der für 3 Runden Bestand hat. Jede Kreatur, die diesen Bereich betritt (oder dort steht, wenn der Effekt angewandt wird), erleidet 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} mit 30 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} Stufen Verbrennen.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wielder uses this grenade, they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 rounds. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} levels of burning.

traits.locale_text:
Wenn der Träger diese Granate einsetzt, erleidet er 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g}.
Diese Granate erzeugt einen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brennenden{/g} Bereich, der für 3 Runden Bestand hat. Jede Kreatur, die diesen Bereich betritt (oder dort steht, wenn der Effekt angewandt wird), erleidet 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} mit 30 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} Stufen Verbrennen.

Immer wenn der Träger diese Granate einsetzt, erleidet er 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g}.
Diese Granate erzeugt einen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brennenden{/g} Bereich, der für 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} Bestand hat, verursacht beim Aufprall 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} mit 30 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und fügt Verbrennen {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} zu.

languages.text:
Lorsque l'utilisateur lance cette grenade, il subit 5 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g}.
Cette grenade crée une zone {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardente{/g} qui dure 3 rounds. Toutes les créatures qui y pénètrent ou qui s'y trouvent déjà au moment où l'effet est appliqué subissent 10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} avec 30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}, ainsi que {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} niveaux de Combustion.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wielder uses this grenade, they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 rounds. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} levels of burning.

traits.locale_text:
Lorsque l'utilisateur lance cette grenade, il subit 5 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g}.
Cette grenade crée une zone {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardente{/g} qui dure 3 rounds. Toutes les créatures qui y pénètrent ou qui s'y trouvent déjà au moment où l'effet est appliqué subissent 10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} avec 30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}, ainsi que {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} niveaux de Combustion.

Lorsque l'utilisateur lance cette grenade, il subit 5 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g}.
Cette grenade génère une zone {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardente{/g} qui dure 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, inflige 10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} avec 30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} à l'impact, ainsi que l'effet Combustion ({uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e}).

Lorsque l'utilisateur lance cette grenade, il subit 5 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g}.
La grenade inflige 10 points de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} avec 30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} à l'impact et crée une zone {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardente{/g} qui dure 3 rounds et inflige {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} niveaux de Combustion.

languages.text:
Whenever the wielder uses this grenade, they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 rounds, deals 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} on enter and inflicts {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} levels of burning.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wielder uses this grenade, they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 rounds, deals 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} on enter and inflicts {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} levels of burning.

languages.text:
Bu bombayı kullanan kişi, 5 puan {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasara{/g} maruz kalır.
Bu bomba, 3 raunt boyunca {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanan{/g} bir alan meydana getirir. Bu alana giren (veya etki uygulandığı anda orada duran) bir yaratık, %30 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değerine sahip 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarı{/g} alır ve {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} seviye yanmaya maruz kalır.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wielder uses this grenade, they suffer 5 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}.
This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 3 rounds. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 10 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 30% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and {uip|Damage|2aa737e3159f4e06af5ba0409c910f1e} levels of burning.
